#summary Library Reference

=lcd_printString()=

==Description==
Prints text to the LCD.

==Syntax==
lcd_printString(string)

==Parameters==
string: the string to be printed.

==Returns==
None.
==Examples==
{{{
#include "LiquidCrystal.h"

void setup()
{
  lcd_4bit(8, 9, 4, 5, 6, 7);
  lcd_begin(16, 2);
  Serial_begin(9600);
}

void loop()
{
  if(Serial_available())
  {
    lcd_write(Serial_read());
  }
}
}}}
